extensionName.message: ChatGPT Reader & Transcriber: Free AI Text to Speech & Speech to Text

extensionDescription.message: Free AI text to speech (tts) & speech to text (stt) with ChatGPT. Listen to natural voices or transcribe audio instantly.

drag_and_drop_files.message: Drag 'n' Drop Files Here, or Click to Select File

upload_limit.message: You Can Upload a File Up to 24 MB

would_you_like_to_download_or_listen.message: Would you like to download or listen to the audio?

please_wait_file_downloading.message: Please wait while the file is being downloaded...

full_download_note.message: If the file did not download automatically, please click the 'Download' button below.

full_download_note_t.message: Your audio has been fully transcribed, click the ‘Download’ button below.

gpt4_download_note.message: Dear ChatGPT premium users, make sure the model you have chosen is 'GPT-4o' or 'GPT-5 Instant' for fastest download speeds, avoid choosing models that have a slow output speed. Close the extension overlay to change the model.

cancel_download_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

accuracy_warning.message: GPT Reader may generate audio that is not 100% accurate. If you start to notice differences then it is recommended to close the overlay and create a new ChatGPT chat and try using the GPT Reader extension again.

feedback_prompt.message: We are always looking for ways to improve our services. Please let us know what we can do better.

feedback_question.message: What do you think about this extension?

error_no_start.message: An error has stopped the download from starting, click on the back button and upload text again to resolve

error_stopped_midway.message: Download has stopped due to an error, please download the processed audio thus far by clicking the download button below.

cancel_download_confirmation_title.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

cancel_download_confirmation_sr.message: You want to cancel the download?

note_partial_audio.message: Note: Click the download button above to download the audio for the portion of your text that has been processed so far.

gpt_reader_chunk_explanation.message: GPT Reader & Transciber is able to provide its services for free by breaking down user provided content into smaller chunks and sending them to ChatGPT for analysis. Depending on your usage, you might temporarily reach ChatGPT's rate limits. If this happens, you may need to wait about an hour before using ChatGPT or this extension again.

gpt_transcriber_chunk_explanation.message: GPT Transcriber is able to provide speech to text for free by breaking down large audio into smaller chunks and sending them to ChatGPT Whisper API for analysis. Depending on your usage, you might temporarily reach ChatGPT's rate limits. If this happens, you may need to wait about an hour before using ChatGPT or this extension again.

acknowledge_and_accept.message: By continuing, you acknowledge and accept this as part of using the extension.

offline_warning.message: You seem to be offline! Please check your network connection and try again!

slow_response_warning.message: GPT Reader seems to be taking longer than usual. Please click the back button and try uploading your text again.

voice_selector_description.message: Choose from a variety of ChatGPT's enhanced voice options. Please note that the selection must be made prior to uploading your text.

cannot_upload_one_file.message: Cannot upload more than 1 file at a time

chatgpt_issue.message: ChatGPT seems to be having issues, click on the back button and try uploading your text again.

simplify_reading.message: Simplify reading long documents with GPT

ongoing_conversation_error.message: There is an on-going conversation or you have exceeded the hourly limit. Please wait a few minutes and try again later!

chat_error.message: It seems that ChatGPT might be either displaying an error, generating a prompt, or you've reached your hourly limit. Please click on the back button and try uploading your text again.

input_required_error.message: This is a required field (min 5 characters)

please_wait_previous.message: Please wait until the previous request is completed

presence_confirmation_yes.message: Yes, I want to continue listening

download_confirm.message: This will download the audio for the portion of your text that has been processed so far. Are you sure you want to continue?

feedback_thanks.message: Thank you for your valuable feedback!

five_stars.message: If you're enjoying GPT Reader & Transcriber, we'd love your feedback on the Chrome Web Store.
